title: Cape Hatteras National Seashore: Curriculum Materials
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Curriculum Materials                Curriculum Materials       Cape Hatteras has several lesson plans designed to allow teachers to bring the seashore to the classroom and the classroom to the seashore. Pre-visit, on-site, and post-visit activities for history and social studies lessons are available for download.   To schedule a field trip, view the Field Trips page.                  Tooth or No Tooth? How to Eat Like a Whale Students will learn some of the differences between baleen and toothed...               Little Kinnakeet Life-Saving Station: Home to...
